author: Laura McQuillan
description: Earlier this month, 50 Calgarians were summoned from a mall's food court, at lunch time, and told to go at once to the nearby Calgary Courts Centre to participate in jury selection. They couldn't refuse.
title: From food court to criminal court: Why people are being plucked off the street for jury duty
content: For those who dread jury duty, the idea of being plucked off the street and sent to court to immediately sit on a jury might sound like a nightmare, but it happens in Canada more often than you might… [+5478 chars]
